amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds be used to plan for, begin, continue, complete, process, or approve a public-private competition to determine whether Federal civilian jobs should be outsourced.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 39 printed in House Report 114-623 to require that no funds be used to plan for, begin, continue, complete, process, or approve a public-private competition under the Office of Management and Budget Circular A-76.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A037) offered by Mr. Cartwright.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
